column4: Hello everyone, I am looking for some answers to some questions I have regarding my video card and xorg and compizfusion
I posted most of the details here http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=5430090#post5430090
I would be really appreciative of any help
what driver are you using. your xorg.conf is normal btw
I haven't set up anything specific beyond default installation
then do. same as in debian. Xorg logs
then you need to enable DRM
It's odd because it seems like I have some of the Compiz effects
also glxinfo |grep direct to check for direct rendering
Pardon my ignorance, I wouldnt know what to do with the logs, nor where they are

Right, which is what I thought ... It seems like it is working, but the thing is, I am following a tutorial to embed a terminal in the desktop and it says System > Preferences should have a COMPIZ entry
So there should not be a Compiz entry in the System > Preferences option?
